title: Kendra Wilkinson: In Her Own Words
description: Kendra Wilkinson is an American television personality. Kendra starred in the E! reality series The Girls Next Door with Hugh Hefner, Holly Madison, and Bridget Marquardt. She went on to headline in a spin-off called Kendra after The Girls Next Door ended. Kendra follows the life of Wilkinson, her husband Hank Baskett, and their son, Hank Baskett IV.In addition to her starring roles on E! Entertainment Television, Kendra Wilkinson has made appearances on Dancing with the Stars, Las Vegas, and Entourage. She has also written two memoirs about her life as a celebrity.This well researched and edited collection of quotations and sayings provide insight into the thinking of Kendra Wilkinson on a variety of topics including marriage, motherhood, partying, and life at the Playboy Mansion.
author: Charlotte Nixon
